title: not a fast flags list update!
description: click view on how to use fast flags

data.step 1: to be able to use fast flags (again) you need to go in C:\Users\ur_pc_name\AppData\Local\Roblox\ClientSettings
data.step 2: there should be a IxpSettings.json file inside, which allows you to use fast flags by pasting ur fast flags in there
data.step 3, optional: if it does not appear, just create one and paste ur fast flags in there.
data.reminder: my fast flags will not be maintained anymore
